item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Foster's!
Foster's Website

We had a lot of fun at the first event in July so come back for our second happy hour at this great restaurant/bar.

Drink Specials:
$6 well drinks (including Absolut, Jack Daniels, Jose Cuervo, Tanqueray, and Dewar's).

Food:
Complimentary appetizers

The group at Foster's said that they will do their best to be sure that they have bartenders and food for the number of people coming, so please be sure to RSVP early for this HH!

Contact is Andrea (203-641-8083)

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.name: 8/20 Monday Happy Hour at Foster's
